mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_Store (category_code, product_name, product_stock, product_Brand, product_Main, product_Serve, product_desc, product_date, product_option, product_price) VALUES (#{category_Code}, #{product_Name}, #{product_Stock}, #{product_Brand}, #{product_Main}, #{product_Serve}, #{product_Desc}, sysdate, #{product_Option}, #{product_Price} )
mapper.select: select * from product_Store where product_name like '%'||#{deleteProductName}||'%' order by product_number desc
select * from construction_company where cc_cname like '%'||#{deletecompanyName}||'%' order by cc_id desc
select * from (select rownum rnum,c.* from (select * from Construction_Inquiry order by cd_bgroup desc,cd_bstep asc) c) where rnum between #{param1} and #{param2}
select * from (select rownum rnum,c.* from (select * from user_inquiry order by ud_bgroup desc,ud_bstep asc) c) where rnum between #{param1} and #{param2}
select rownum rnum ,a.* from( select d.* from Delivery_Status d order by d.delivery_date desc) a order by rnum asc
